                "_id": "310e4d65f1d13503211f9e6174ceae45234543593d1c591212d353e092f2c40b",
                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"MBA_M4_13\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[ or {%pricing id=\"MBA_M4_13\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}{%brl%}{%brxl%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"MBA_M4_13\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"MBA_M4_13\" collapse=\"true\"%})",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",
                    "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                    "textType": "markdown",
                    "categories": [
                      "legal"
                    ],
                    "metadata": [
                      "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117"
                    ],
                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."
                  },

                    "copy": "https://www.goldmansachs.com/terms-and-conditions/Apple-Card-Customer-Agreement.pdf"
                  }
                ]

                "_id": "c11509322e5e890979b5e61977c6b6a2558ead22fdd05e4821daf94a6ea5d15d",
                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"MBP_M4_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[or {%pricing id=\"MBP_M4_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"MBP_M4_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"MBP_M4_MAIN\" collapse=\"true\"%})",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",
                    "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                    "textType": "markdown",
                    "categories": [

                    ],
                    "metadata": [
                      "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117"
                    ],
                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."
                  },

                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"IMAC2024_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[ or {%pricing id=\"IMAC2024_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"IMAC2024_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"IMAC2024_MAIN\" collapse=\"true\"%})",

                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",

                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."

                "_id": "bf9421b0bd6b405a3e0dba6d9953975be16003cdfd0b1b47aec672a548752ed2",
                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"MACSTUDIO2025_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[ or {%pricing id=\"MACSTUDIO2025_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"MACSTUDIO2025_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"MACSTUDIO2025_MAIN\" collapse=\"true\"%})",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",
                    "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                    "textType": "markdown",
                    "categories": [

                    ],
                    "metadata": [
                      "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117"
                    ],
                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."
                  },

                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."

                "_id": "d0b4bc53363cd0d10445b340e7ab7e4d445bb0e77fa680a4fa9631177e81bca2",
                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"PRODISPLAYXDR_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[ or {%pricing id=\"PRODISPLAYXDR_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"PRODISPLAYXDR_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"PRODISPLAYXDR_MAIN\" collapse=\"true\"%})",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",

                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."

                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products.               "pricing": {
                "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/product-tile-section/imac/pricing",
                "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                "textType": "markdown",
                "metadata": [

                ],
                "_id": "14bbeaa652e1e0b5553f64dc777e7614491d75c6bcca5c72c388bdde09975bc0",
                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"IMAC2024_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[ or {%pricing id=\"IMAC2024_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"IMAC2024_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"IMAC2024_MAIN\" collapse=\"true\"%})",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",
                    "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                    "textType": "markdown",
                    "categories": [
                      "legal"
                    ],
                    "metadata": [
                      "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117"
                    ],
                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."
                  },
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/legal-urls/apple-card-customer-agreement",
                    "_model": "plain-text-copy",
                    "textType": "plainText",
                    "metadata": [],
                    "_id": "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117",
                    "copy": "https://www.goldmansachs.com/terms-and-conditions/Apple-Card-Customer-Agreement.pdf"
                  }
                ]

                "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/product-tile-section/mac-mini/pricing",

                ],
                "_id": "c7130d223a3e871c161a1157aa67d0449c1637f40e917ab5ae721bb86ffe6319",
                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"MACMINI2024-MAIN\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[ or {%pricing id=\"MACMINI2024-MAIN\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}{%brl%}{%brxl%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"MACMINI2024-MAIN\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"MACMINI2024-MAIN\" collapse=\"true\"%})",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",
                    "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                    "textType": "markdown",
                    "categories": [
                      "legal"
                    ],
                    "metadata": [
                      "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117"
                    ],
                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."
                  },

                    "copy": "https://www.goldmansachs.com/terms-and-conditions/Apple-Card-Customer-Agreement.pdf"
                  }
                ]

                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."

                "copy": "{%pricing id=\"STUDIODISPLAY_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.from\"%} :[ or {%pricing id=\"STUDIODISPLAY_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.perMonth\"%} {%brm%}for{%nbsp%}{%pricing id=\"STUDIODISPLAY_MAIN\" template=\"price.display.months\"%}{%nbsp%}mo.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}]({%pricing-fallback id=\"STUDIODISPLAY_MAIN\" collapse=\"true\"%})",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-general",

                    "_id": "6a67fd86bff7d578390b1def25d63c278f784b248910bafa64216283fbdcdfcb",
                    "copy": "Financing available to qualified customers, subject to credit approval and credit limit, and requires you to select Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) as your payment type at checkout at Apple. Financing terms vary by product. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. ACMI is not available for purchases made at special storefronts or when using such special discounts in-store at Apple, except ACMI is available at the Education storefront and with the Education discount. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI."

                    "copy": "Great ideas start here.",
                    "_meta": []
                  },
                  "items": [
                    {
                      "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/composition/mac-family-items/banner-card-sections/mac-brand-campaign-items/horizontal-banner-card-items/inner-container-modal-items/inner-content1",
                      "_model": "inner-content",
                      "layout": "text-top",
                      "heading": {
                        "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/banner-card-sections/mac-brand-campaign/learn-more/modal/heading1",
                        "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                        "textType": "markdown",
                        "metadata": [],
                        "_id": "02d36414430e367d96d41bd1159aa48bd31419bcdf4d820060686f3f1a36aa03",
                        "copy": "Alice Wong.",
                        "_meta": []
                      },
                      "copy": {
                        "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/banner-card-sections/mac-brand-campaign/learn-more/modal/content1",
                        "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                        "textType": "markdown",
                        "metadata": [],
                        "_id": "66d5d4be9cf57d68f52231266ee142094dbfddc5c9a36866e7a08dab0dd604fe",
                        "copy": "Disabled voices are often underrepresented in publishing, journalism, and pop culture. To rewrite that narrative, Alice took to her MacBook{%nbsp%}Pro and founded the Disability Visibility Project{%nbsp%} creating a website and brand identity and recruiting participants via social media. Because shes unable to speak, Alice uses the Spoken Content accessibility feature to have Mac voice her thoughts. And she uses Mail and Zoom on a daily basis to champion disabled voices.",
                        "_meta": []
                      },
                      "primaryLinks": {
                        "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/composition/mac-family-items/banner-card-sections/mac-brand-campaign-items/horizontal-banner-card-items/inner-container-modal-items/inner-content1-items/inner-content-links",

                        "copy": "To bring her fashion-forward concept to reality, Ruchika turned to iMac. Her creation: Bodice, a modern fashion brand for Indian working women that leverages Indigenous designs of the past.                         "_id": "cebc59067d2377a1b31808c571c525f662500c21fc88a662346359b713848d71",
                        "copy": "Since 1996, Mac has been a cornerstone of  ocean engineer Bruce Strickrotts explorations. As chief pilot of *Alvin*, a three{%nbhyp%}person submersible, he uses Keynote and iMovie to document discoveries and deliver presentations to audiences all over the world about the oceans impact on people and the planet. Bruce relies on his MacBook{%nbsp%}Pro to be his mobile office, edit suite, and entertainment center on expeditions that sometimes last a month or more.",

                      },

              "headline": {
                "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/icon-card-section/financing/headline",

                "_id": "0bc29b3ef2754f249b43035ced14ca418bf9cf19fc68d70e16d93c140019f08c",
                "copy": "Pay over time, interest{%nbhyp%}free.",
                "_meta": []
              },
              "bodyCopy": {
                "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/icon-card-section/financing/body-copy",
                "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",

                ],
                "_id": "21f3e5c442880ea10b625e49057e99e5959314b6e0fb70b0855f0fe34e873422",
                "copy": "When you choose to check out at Apple with Apple Card Monthly Installments.{%sosumi type=\"external\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
                "_meta": [
                  {
                    "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/financing/acmi-detailed",
                    "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                    "textType": "markdown",
                    "categories": [
                      "legal"
                    ],
                    "metadata": [
                      "94c08ee30d2b3082401ae88a80e03f1f01bfd56a76c19b831ca2812f1841171d",
                      "96b62229a1705cf0f376e1aea533fb89c4d086cb6bd7cc24e884fcb01d3ce79e",
                      "c4f1688ac418d6f55590586382769e485f85b02d2570ee0d4bf4125ca17fc4a6",
                      "779e487f646b0b763e8afe49b062081d9792ee390982d507fa39d30126078117",
                      "1670df75c08ffa0d3e06a9c23af5b58518184a2a7fc8c3b2654e41474c474ff5"
                    ],
                    "_id": "250ac3177dc2f5f9d11db761e1ac01b7c5af10456fe310e1a66092265cc47f61",
                    "copy": "Apple{%nbsp%}Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) is a 0% APR payment option that is only available if you select it at checkout in the U.S. for eligible products purchased at Apple{%nbsp%}Store locations, :[apple.com]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"internal\"%}), the Apple{%nbsp%}Store app, or by calling :[ :[1800MYAPPLE]({%url metadata=\"2\" destination-type=\"external\"%})]({%wj%}), and is subject to credit approval and credit limit. See :[here]({%url metadata=\"3\" destination-type=\"appleExternal\"%}) for more information about eligible products. Existing customers: See your Customer Agreement for your variable APR. As of {%apr value=\"effectiveDate\"%}, the variable APR on new Apple{%nbsp%}Card accounts ranges from {%apr value=\"rates\"%}. You must elect to use ACMI at checkout. If you buy an ACMIeligible product with a one-time payment on Apple{%nbsp%}Card at checkout, that purchase is subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your Apple{%nbsp%}Cards variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. In order to buy an iPhone with ACMI, you must select one of the following carriers (prepaid carrier plans are not supported): AT&T, Boost Mobile, TMobile, or Verizon. An iPhone purchased with ACMI is always unlocked, so you can switch carriers at any time, subject to your carriers terms. ACMI is not available for purchases made at the following special storefronts or when using these discounts in-store at Apple: Apple Employee Purchase Plan; participating corporate Employee Purchase Programs; Apple at Work for small businesses; Government and Veterans and Military Purchase Programs; or on refurbished devices. The last months payment for each product will be the products purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the :[Apple{%nbsp%}Card Customer Agreement]({%url metadata=\"4\" destination-type=\"external\"%}) for more information about ACMI.{%br%}{%br%}To access and use all Apple{%nbsp%}Card features and products available only to Apple{%nbsp%}Card users, you must add Apple{%nbsp%}Card to Wallet on an iPhone or iPad that supports and has the latest version of iOS or iPadOS. Apple{%nbsp%}Card is subject to credit approval, available only for qualifying applicants in the United States, and issued by Goldman Sachs Bank USA, Salt Lake City Branch.{%br%}{%br%}Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC, a subsidiary of Apple{%nbsp%}Inc., is a service provider of Goldman Sachs Bank USA for Apple{%nbsp%}Card and Savings accounts. Neither Apple{%nbsp%}Inc. nor Apple Payments Services{%nbsp%}LLC is a{%nbsp%}bank.{%br%}{%br%}All communications from Apple and Goldman Sachs Bank USA about Apple{%nbsp%}Card (including transactional and marketing communications) and customer service support are available in English. Certain communications about Apple{%nbsp%}Card can be viewed in another language depending on your device language settings. If you reside in the U.S. Virgin Islands, American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, or U.S. Minor Outlying Islands, please call Goldman Sachs at :[ :[877-255-5923]({%url metadata=\"5\" destination-type=\"external\"%})]({%wj%}) with questions about Apple{%nbsp%}Card.{%br%}{%br%}"
                  },

                          ],
                          "_id": "d6e39cebdd473215a0b2d13ff561a86286eb7a4ac3ca367e3c897f41c0836dd6",
                          "copy": "Thanks to the efficiency of Apple{%nbsp%}silicon, Mac laptops deliver up to 24 hours of battery life and incredible performance whether youre plugged in :[or not.]({%wj%}){%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
                          "_meta": [
                            {
                              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/legal/tech-specs-and-features/power-and-battery/macbook-pro-battery",

                              ],
                              "_id": "f626ef8ce13540746b5e895d6962ce1b38cbf867f4a2ee58b8a4d9cba4abb1ea",
                              "copy": "Testing conducted by Apple August through October 2024 using preproduction 16-inch MacBook{%nbsp%}Pro systems with :[Apple M4 Pro,]({%wj%}) 14{%nbhyp%}core CPU, 20{%nbhyp%}core GPU, 48GB of RAM, and 512GB SSD. Wireless web battery life tested by browsing 25 popular websites while connected to Wi-Fi. Video streaming battery life tested with 1080p content in Safari while connected to Wi-Fi. All systems tested with display brightness set to 8 clicks from bottom and keyboard backlight off. Battery life varies by use and configuration. See :[apple.com/batteries]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"internal\"%}) for more information."
                            },

                          "copy": "Use your iPhone from your Mac.",
                          "_meta": []
                        },
                        "copy": {

                          ],
                          "_id": "d34b1db7e8cc0f1e8afc9269021aba99462007b0dd012af3f63fe5aee1abfe85",
                          "copy": "iPhone{%nbsp%}Mirroring lets you see and use whats on your iPhone while using your Mac.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%} And now Live{%nbsp%}Activities from iPhone also appear on your Mac. So you dont have to reach for your phone to stay in the know.",
                          "_meta": [
                            {
                              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/legal/tech-specs-and-features/device-compatibility/iphone-mirroring-reqs",
                              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                              "textType": "markdown",
                              "categories": [
                                "legal"
                              ],
                              "metadata": [],
                              "_id": "b35f7d2735826107de292629a8997613aad809055a0cdb1413dc3f0e41cab31b",
                              "copy": "Available on Mac computers with Apple{%nbsp%}silicon and Intel-based Mac computers with a T2 Security Chip. Requires that your iPhone and Mac are signed in with the same :[Apple Account]({%wj%}) using two-factor authentication, your iPhone and Mac are near each other and have Bluetooth and Wi-Fi turned on, and your Mac is not using AirPlay or Sidecar. Some iPhone features (e.g., camera and microphone) are not compatible with iPhone{%nbsp%}Mirroring."
                            }
                          ]
                        },

                          "copy": "Call and text from your Mac.",

                        },
                        "copy": {
                          "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/feature-card-section/mac-iphone/modal/content2",

                          ],
                          "_id": "a39422833ee27d918457d39a34cd99f14426ede333dbbc99b2dead7dd240e73f",
                          "copy": "With the Phone{%nbsp%}app, you can make or take calls directly from your Mac. And the messages that appear on your iPhone also appear on your Mac. So you can see your conversations on all your{%nbsp%}devices.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
                          "_meta": [
                            {
                              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/legal/tech-specs-and-features/cellular-and-wireless/sms-calls-requirements",

                              ],
                              "metadata": [],
                              "_id": "78ee02121324aade8c8c96400d5d8858ec291b18e88aacf140b521d0f9cc02b0",
                              "copy": "Requires that your iPhone, with an active carrier plan, and Mac are signed in with the same Apple{%nbsp%}Account, your iPhone and Mac are near each other, signed in to FaceTime with the same Apple{%nbsp%}Account, have Wi{%nbhyp%}Fi turned on, and are connected to the same network. An external microphone or headset is required for Mac{%nbsp%}Studio, Mac{%nbsp%}mini, and Mac{%nbsp%}Pro."
                            }
                          ]

                          "copy": "Start an email on your iPhone and finish it on your Mac. With Handoff, when your Mac and iPhone are near each other, you can seamlessly pass what youre doing from one device to :[the other.]({%wj%}){%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%}",

                        "_model": "feature-card-content",
                        "layout": "text-top",
                        "heading": {
                          "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/feature-card-section/apple-values/modal/heading2",
                          "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                          "textType": "markdown",
                          "metadata": [],
                          "_id": "db3975c66384e55889295d48388c1bff2a69aee81b7889b484141a90b019b046",
                          "copy": "Good for you. Good for the planet.",
                          "_meta": []
                        },
                        "copy": {
                          "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/feature-card-section/apple-values/modal/content2",
                          "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                          "textType": "markdown",
                          "metadata": [
                            "53e78ae190b2db1b784b98a892fda0f4b7f327307a901670e24b011125df07e4"
                          ],
                          "_id": "56c6ef16f4889e47260f53c91d17e85a182a49700767d1cb9778e3d4de57fb4d",
                          "copy": "With Apple{%nbsp%}Trade{%nbsp%}In, you can get a great value for your current device and apply it toward a new one. If your device isnt eligible for credit, well recycle it for{%nbsp%}free.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
                          "_meta": [
                            {
                              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/trade-in/trade-in",
                              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                              "textType": "markdown",
                              "categories": [
                                "legal"
                              ],
                              "metadata": [],
                              "_id": "53e78ae190b2db1b784b98a892fda0f4b7f327307a901670e24b011125df07e4",
                              "copy": "Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year, and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Trade-in value may be applied toward qualifying new device purchase, or added to an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax may be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores, and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel, or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apples trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply."
                            }
                          ]
                        },

          {
            "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/composition/mac-family-items/banner-card-sections/switch-to-mac-items/trade-in",
            "_model": "banner-card",
            "header": {
              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/banner-card-sections/switch-to-mac/trade-in/headline",
              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
              "textType": "markdown",
              "metadata": [],
              "_id": "2de543b09893bed43133508922f6ff8507076842dacc887f3ed4057a71b67f7b",
              "copy": "Give us the old. {%brs%}{%brm%}Save on the{%nbsp%}new.",
              "_meta": []
            },
            "bodyCopy": {
              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/banner-card-sections/switch-to-mac/trade-in/body-copy",
              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
              "textType": "markdown",
              "metadata": [
                "53e78ae190b2db1b784b98a892fda0f4b7f327307a901670e24b011125df07e4"
              ],
              "_id": "2521b9cfd90adf07d3fa03a9ae791c453347aa5ae82a4530c3d073a29329e4fb",
              "copy": "With Apple{%nbsp%}Trade{%nbsp%}In, you can get a great value for your current device and apply it toward a new one. If your device isnt eligible for credit, well recycle it for{%nbsp%}free.{%sosumi type=\"numbered\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
              "_meta": [
                {
                  "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/trade-in/trade-in",
                  "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                  "textType": "markdown",
                  "categories": [
                    "legal"
                  ],
                  "metadata": [],
                  "_id": "53e78ae190b2db1b784b98a892fda0f4b7f327307a901670e24b011125df07e4",
                  "copy": "Trade-in values will vary based on the condition, year, and configuration of your eligible trade-in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Trade-in value may be applied toward qualifying new device purchase, or added to an Apple{%nbsp%}Gift{%nbsp%}Card. Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax may be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In-store trade-in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores, and may vary between in-store and online trade-in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade-in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel, or limit quantity of any trade-in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apples trade-in partner for trade-in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply."
                }
              ]
            },

          "_model": "story-modification",

          "content": {
            "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/composition/mac-family-items/ribbon-section-items/holiday-idl",
            "_model": "ribbon",
            "_modelname": "RibbonModel",
            "title": "Holiday FY26 IDL",
            "copy": {
              "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/mac/content/mac-family/ribbon-section/holiday-idl/copy",
              "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
              "textType": "markdown",
              "metadata": [
                "46137aceef9afeff6b9712d4685f95fdd6d7a4e86a6718188c954f587bdda1a2"
              ],
              "_id": "321f1968130750a6b61205550df40287f1da908dcf42ff2063a32a2812ecfe67",
              "copy": "Get gifts in time for the holidays with free two-hour delivery on eligible products  now through{%nbsp%}12/24.{%sosumi type=\"promoted\" metadata=\"1\"%}",
              "_meta": [
                {
                  "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/delivery/delivery-offer",
                  "_model": "markdown-inline-copy",
                  "textType": "markdown",
                  "categories": [
                    "legal"
                  ],
                  "metadata": [
                    "799b0805c5840fc4044d47c840993884d7864d192ee389f3d2692ee6f5682847"
                  ],
                  "_id": "46137aceef9afeff6b9712d4685f95fdd6d7a4e86a6718188c954f587bdda1a2",
                  "copy": "$0 two-hour delivery on purchases made from December 22, 2025, through December 24, 2025, on eligible Apple products in most metros. Offer applies to in{%nbhyp%}stock purchase(s) of iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple{%nbsp%}Watch, AirPods, Apple{%nbsp%}TV, and Beats only. Offer is not available on customized Mac, engraved products, and for certain order types including orders paid for with financing or by bank transfer. Delivery times vary according to your selected delivery address, availability of your items, and the time of day you place your order. :[Find a store]({%url metadata=\"1\" destination-type=\"internal\"%}) to view local store hours or see checkout for estimated delivery. A signature is required for delivery."
                },
                {
                  "_path": "/content/dam/applecom-cms/live/en_US/global-legal/legal-urls/retail",
                  "_model": "plain-text-copy",
                  "textType": "plainText",
                  "metadata": [],
                  "_id": "799b0805c5840fc4044d47c840993884d7864d192ee389f3d2692ee6f5682847",
                  "copy": "/retail"
                }
              ]
            },

children.label: copy
children.value: Disabled voices are often underrepresented in publishing, journalism, and pop culture. To rewrite that narrative, Alice took to her MacBook{%nbsp%}Pro and founded the Disability Visibility Project{%nbsp%} creating a website and brand identity and recruiting participants via social media. Because shes unable to speak, Alice uses the Spoken Content accessibility feature to have Mac voice her thoughts. And she uses Mail and Zoom on a daily basis to champion disabled voices.

children.label: copy
children.value: Two images shown. One image shows Alice Wong, disability advocate, working on her MacBook Pro 16-inch in a room filled with indoor plants. The other image shows MacBook Pro 16-inch, a Pages document open, and the website disabilityvisibilityproject.com on Safari.
